text: Paulo António Alves (22 October 1969 – 17 August 2021), commonly known as Paulão, was an Angolan footballer who played as a midfielder. He made over fifty appearances for the Angola national football team from 1993 until 2001. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Angolan footballers
title: Paulão (footballer, born 1969)
